requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: CPU @ 1.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Processor or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
